ComicInfo.Title: Football Basics; Miss Crabby Pageant; Public Speaking
ComicInfo.Summary: LUCY'S CRABBINESS IS FINALLY PUT TO THE TEST! When it comes to winning this year's Miss Crabby Pageant, Lucy is going all out. But with competition like Molley Volley and Crybaby Boobie, can Lucy out crabby her way to the shiny winner's trophy? Enjoy 'Miss Crabby Pageant' and many more Peanuts adventures in this latest issue, full of heart and fun galore!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:43:27. [CVDB435109]
ComicInfo.Writer: Bob Scott, Charles M. Schulz, Jeff Dyer, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Penciller: Charles M. Schulz, Mona Koth, Stephanie Gladden, Vicki Scott
ComicInfo.Inker: Charles M. Schulz, Justin Thompson, Paige Braddock
ComicInfo.Colorist: Art Roche, Donna Almendrala, Justin Thompson, Lisa Moore
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Galer, Alexis E. Fajardo, Matt Gagnon, Shannon Watters
ComicInfo.Characters: Charlie Brown, Crybaby Boobie, Linus van Pelt, Lucy van Pelt, Molley Volley
